message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a significant discount from its market value, aiming to provide you with exceptional savings while ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your positive response.
